title: Why use reflection in nn.Module?
body_html:
Hello everyone! When I read the source code of Pytorch in module.py, I have a simple question :
why use
modules = self.__dict__.get('_modules')
rather than
modules = self._modules

What is the reason to make this choice? Thank you very much!
body_text:
Hello everyone! When I read the source code of Pytorch in module.py, I have a simple question :
why use

rather than

What is the reason to make this choice? Thank you very much!
body:
Hello everyone! When I read the source code of Pytorch in [module.py](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L260), I have a simple question :
why use 
`
modules = self.__dict__.get('_modules')
`
rather than
`
modules = self._modules 
`

What is the reason to make this choice? Thank you very much!
